data.name: Demon Skin - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
DEMON SKIN IS AVAILABLE NOW

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1522140/Demon_Skin/


A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/


About the Game

About this DLC

The thunder of war drums and the charming female voice, the roar of the horns and the melancholy of the lyric melodies – that’s all about the score written by Nikita Yamov exclusively for Demon Skin.

Various events in the game world are reflected within the unique and diverse musical palette of these tracks: from the massive orchestral sound to the Russian folk instruments.

data.short_description: 9 exclusive tracks of an all-original Demon Skin soundtrack.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 135 MB available space
